name: adsp_tcf_project
description: Main package file for the TCF Project
author: See repository readme

scripts.setup: npm run setup_frontend && npm run setup_backend
scripts.setup_backend: cd backend/ && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.deploy_backend: docker-compose up --build -d mongodb && cd backend/ && npm run start
scripts.deploy_dev_backend: docker-compose up --build -d mongodb && cd backend/ && npm run dev
